channel.title: presentations on Professional Blog
channel.description: Recent content in presentations on Professional Blog

item.title: New professional blog
item.description: Welcome. I’ve taken some time over the holidays to do a little re-organisation of my online presence, and I’d like to tell you what I did, and how. First up, is this site. I’ve been considering what to put onto my Github pages for a while, and I think the most obvious thing are links to my recent work. As it is build on Octopress/Jekyll, it is also well supported by Github, and allows me to add static content pages into the site as well, so I’ve moved my online presentations here, from https://abulman.
